dt: {bc}the usually humorous use of a word in such a way as to suggest two or more of its meanings or the meaning of another word similar in sound

et: perhaps from Italian {it}puntiglio{/it} fine point, quibble {ma}{mat|punctilio|}{/ma}
shortdef: the usually humorous use of a word in such a way as to suggest two or more of its meanings or the meaning of another word similar in sound
